channel.title: Projects on Amir M. Ahmadian's Personal Webpage
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Amir M. Ahmadian's Personal Webpage

item.title: Tap4s
item.author: ahmadia@kth.se (Amir M. Ahmadian)
item.description: A security type system for the P4 programming language, TAP4S employs a lightweight interval analysis combined with security labels to guarantee the noninterference of P4 programs.

item.title: DiVerT
item.author: ahmadia@kth.se (Amir M. Ahmadian)
item.description: A prototype tool that relies on type-based dependency analysis and symbolic tuples to track the dependencies of different program execution paths, and verify them against the disjunctive security policy of the underlying database.

item.title: DynCoVer
item.author: ahmadia@kth.se (Amir M. Ahmadian)
item.description: A prototype tool to verify program security under dynamic policies. DynCoVer employs symbolic execution and Z3 solver to symbolically execute a Java program and check its security against the active policy at each observable output.

item.title: Je
item.author: ahmadia@kth.se (Amir M. Ahmadian)
item.description: A programming language to develop secure enclave applications. Je uses high-level abstractions to partition a Java program into enclave and non-enclave parts, and a security type system to guarantee the robustness of the enclave part
